title: Block phone numbers using wildcards
content:
Is it possible to block calls using wildcards in the number? If not, can that feature be added?  

Most of my spam calls now come from spoofed numbers starting with a particular area code and exchange, but the last 3-4 digits change each time to avoid call blockers.  

So I would like to enter the number to be blocked using wildcards to match the offending pattern. For example:  312-555-1***
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
